PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Ansco Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Mr. Howard Smith, 4929 Jordan Way was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 11, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Do you believe youngsters in their early teens, that is from 13 to 16 years of age, should be permitted to smoke cigarettes or drink alcoholic beverages?" answer reads: "No I don't believe in that. For one thing, smoking and drinking are detrimental to the heart."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Howard Smith wearing plaid hat, moustache, and dark sweater, standing in front of house with light colored clapboard siding
